articles.title: Kim Jong Il sees art performance of Russian academy ensemble
Kim Jong Il receives state academy ensemble of Ministry of Interior of Russia
Military revolutionary museum visited
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il receives state academy ensemble of Ministry of Interior of Russia 
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il sunday received leading members and artistes of the state academy ensemble of the Ministry of Interior of Russia headed by V. P. Yelseev, which had participated in the 19th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
 Kim Jong Il warmly welcomed their visit to the DPRK and conversed with them in a warm and friendly atmosphere.    
 The head of the ensemble expressed his heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Il for giving the ensemble the special privilege by seeing its performance.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea joint military exercise under fire
articles.content:
Military revolutionary museum visited 
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- Party and state cadres and leading officials of ministries and national institutions of the DPRK visited the revolutionary museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Sunday on the occasion of the 69th birthday of the heroic Korean People's Army.
 The visitors looked round with deep emotion the historical relics and materials showing the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the army building.    
 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il set forth the Juche-oriented military idea and war methods and made tireless efforts for the defence of the country and the strengthening of the people's army and thus recorded a brilliant chapter in the history of building the revolutionary armed forces.

Greetings to General Secretary of C.C., CPV
Kim Yong Nam meets British party delegation
articles.content:
Greetings to General Secretary of C.C., CPV 
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee today sent a message of greetings to Nong Duc Manh upon his election as General Secretary of the Central Committee of Communist Party of Vietnam at its 9th Congress.
 The message noted that his election was an expression of the deep trust and expectation of all members of the CPV for him. 
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and peoples of the two countries would grow stronger, it wished him success in his responsible work for carrying out the resolution of the 9th Congress of the party.
